import React, { useState } from 'react' import Header from '../Components/Header' function OrderForm() { const [userdetails,setUserdetails] = useState({ name:"",mobilenumber:"",pincode:"",address:"" }) const handleclose = () =>{ set({ bookname:"",author:"",price:"",bookImage:"" }) setPreview("") } console.log(userdetails); return ( <>

BOOKIES

setUserdetails({...userdetails,name:e.target.value})}/>
setUserdetails({...userdetails,mobilenumber:e.target.value})}/>
setUserdetails({...userdetails,pincode:e.target.value})}/>

) } export default OrderForm
